programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: The Kardashians vs. Jordyn Woods
programme.desc: S1:E4 Jordyn Woods was somebody the Kardashian family trusted. But all that changed when rumours of her being a home wrecker emerged after a scandalous yet confusing night at a party with Khloé Kardashian’s then-boyfriend and NBA player, Tristan Thompson. Our team investigated both sides of the story and got the real truth about what happened that night.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: Wolf of Wallstreet's Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur Jordan "The Wolf of Wall Street" Belfort explains how his own tale of redemption can help motivate you at your darkest hour.

programme.title: Win Against all Odds
programme.desc: Homesick, bankrupt, and father-less, young Dan Lok was devastated when he arrived home one day to find his mom in tears. His riveting coming-of-age story will inspire you to put your best foot forward every single day.

programme.title: Find Your Talent
programme.desc: Tom Bilyeu, co-founder of Quest Nutrition and co-founder & CEO of Impact Theory, reveals how this shift in mindset helped him find his passion.

programme.title: Embrace the Suck
programme.desc: Navy SEAL veteran David Goggins shares how he overcame so many debilitating obstacles to later achieve incredible military and personal honors, and the mentality that kept him going and made him push beyond his limits.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Tell my Story
programme.desc: Jason Reid faced every parent’s worst nightmare when his son Ryan died by suicide at the age of 14. The tragedy lit a fire in him to end teen suicide by 2030. Fathers NEED To Change NOW. In this Goalcast Original, Jason Reid and a group of fathers have an intense conversation about teen suicide. Jason shares his heartfelt story as well as crucial parenting advice that can have life-saving consequences. Witness the power of vulnerability and discover simple ways you can transform your relationship with your kids by giving them the tools to thrive in life.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: "Roth IRA is ""The Greatest Account Ever"" Per Ed Slott. But Why?"
programme.desc: "Just about every week here on YMYW, Joe and Big Al talk about converting your retirement savings to Roth accounts. But why? Whats the big deal? Today the ""IRA guru"" Ed Slott, CPA returns to Your Money, Your Wealth in podcast number 526 with Joe Anderson, CFP and Big Al Clopine, CPA to tell us why he calls the Roth IRA ""the greatest account ever created."" (Heres a hint: its all about having tax-free income in retirement - and beyond.) Plus, where to prioritize saving for retirement? Jerry Tom in St. Louis wants to know. Are Christian and Tiffany in Montana on track for retirement, and should they rebalance their ETFs? Should Frank in Lake Wobegons wife take her teachers salary over 9 months or 12 months? And finally, Jon thinks the target retirement withdrawal rates Joe and Big Al use to spitball are too low - well see what they think."

programme.title: The Simple Solution To Financial Fraud... But..
programme.desc: "Banking has a fraud problem, thats not new, and it costs clients billions of dollars every year. We are all so used to this now that its not even shocking anymore but there is now a simple solution that can eliminate this problem while actually saving the banks money. However, banking executives want you to forget about this solution as quickly as possible or just convince you that it wont work. Regular viewers of the channel will know I hate dragging out the answer to a simple question for the sake of watch time, so the solution is just to force bankers to work from home, where they actually have less oversight from managers and authorities. A recent study by the European Journal of Financial Management found that FIVE TIMES less likely to engage in financial misconduct when working from home. There are two reasons why this works so well and three infuriating reasons why executives wont let it happen. The first reason is simply because everything done from home goes on a digital record. In America banks are not allowed to delete most records for five years, and thats not just financial transactions and signed contracts, it also includes internal files like emails, meeting minutes and instant chat messages between employees. A billion dollars lawsuit was recently settled with major banks that didnt put effective measures in place to stop their employees sending messages via encrypted messaging platforms like WhatsApp that dont leave the required records. There was no way to tell if these bankers were talking about their plans for the weekend or conspiring on an insider trading scheme. Laws vary in other countries but there is always one record thats impossible to keep track of and that is in person conversations. There are three types of conversations that happen in banks with alarming frequency that make this a serious problem. So its time to learn How Money Works to find out how we found a simple solution to fraud and why we are going to pretend it doesnt exist."

programme.title: How The Big Short Actually Worked
programme.desc: "The Big Short with its all star cast recounts the events of three groups of traders that bet against the housing market in the years before the sub prime mortgage crisis that would eventually result in the failure of key financial institutions. The Big Short is unique as a high budget Hollywood production that actually takes the time to properly portray the way that finance really worked behind the scenes and uses financial events to progress the plot rather than focusing on wild parties, sports cars and sexy ladies like some other movies that took a very different approach to storytelling. Similarly to the Wolf of Wall Street, the big short is a move based off a book only the wolf of wall street was an autobiography written by Jordan Belfort himself and The Big Short: Inside The Doomsday Machine, was a standard non-fiction title that described the role of several players in the creation of the credit default market betting against the American housing market. The Big Short was written by Michael Lewis, a veteran financial journalist and the book really does read like a 320-page financial article, in that its very information dense but also very well researched and verified. For this video we will only be looking at the players that are in the movie, but the book does go into detail on some people that were either entirely cut from the film or merged into other characters to make the movie entertaining to a broader audience. Unfortunately, in the process of making it appealing as possible to cinema goers the movie did cut out some very important details, and also just straight up got some things wrong. So, its time to lean How Money Works and give you guys the investment bankers insight into what really happened in the Big Short. "

programme.title: "Late Savings, Month-End Money, and Balanced Living"
programme.desc: Financial advisor Ric Edelman explains what to do if youve had a late start on saving; advises what to do with money leftover at the end of each month; and Jean Edelman shares how to live a balanced life.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth: 5 Money Mistakes That Can Sabotage Your Retirement
programme.desc: When it comes to retirement, sometimes the things you dont do can be more costly than the things you do. Are you your own worst enemy? One reason people make those mistakes is that they dont know where to go for advice. much less what they should be doing. Your retirement involves more than just opening a savings account and forgetting all about it. You have to know your goals for retirement, and then perhaps alter your lifestyle to meet those goals. The ""Dynamic Duo"" of financial planning, Joe Anderson, CFP, and Alan Clopine, CPA, help you avoid some very costly mistakes that could sabotage your retirement.

Russia HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew as they adventure through Russia. Despite friction with the government, and a string of questionable characters, the crew conquers Europe‚Äôs highest peak.

programme.title: Canoe Tripping In Killarney Provincial Park
programme.desc: A World Champion kayaker, the author of twelve best-selling instructional books and videos on paddling, and a YouTube influencer with approximately 14 million views to his videos, Ken Whiting is the host of Facing Waves. Now entering it's 8th season, Facing Waves celebrates the cultures, landscapes and adventures that surround the world’s top paddling destinations. The popular TV series resonates with those who share a passion for the outdoors and seek out authentic experiences.

programme.title: The Far North
programme.desc: Join TGR and Anthill Films on an adventure to the frigid north, where bikers will attempt to bring world-class tricks to a frozen and glaciated landscape while filming for unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Tulsequah, BC HD
programme.desc: Tag along as the crew sets up in the wilderness of Tulsequah, BC. Utilizing the expertise of some of the world‚Äôs foremost big mountain riders, the crew finds first ascents through dangerous terrain.

programme.title: Grand Teton
programme.desc: Jeremy Jones heads to Jackson Hole to attempt to ride the Otterbody in Teton Park. Jeremy and the Teton Gravity Research team will face the harrowing climb to the summit of the Grand Teton.

programme.title: Sea Kayaking the Rideau Canal - Part 1
programme.desc: A UNESCO world heritage site, the Rideau Canal runs through the heart of Canada’s capital city of Ottawa. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he takes a different approach to see the canal by exploring a larger section of the 126-mile waterway by houseboat and kayak.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge is a short documentary about a group of surfers trying to make surfboards out of ice. It follows the process from freezing the boards, shaping them and taking them out into the sea. There is a lot of trying and failing. Will it work at all? The boards are slippery, and they melt very fast. Everything needs to work simultaneously: The surfers must be ready. The boards cannot crack. The perfect wave must come. Ice Edge is a film where nature and people play together.

programme.title: Bulgaria HD
programme.desc: Join the TGR crew as they explore a local mountain resort in Bulgaria called Bansko. The crew then hits the mountain tops, jumping huge cliffs and shooting narrow couloirs.

programme.title: The Chase (2020)
programme.desc: Starring Mitchell Blewitt and filmed over four years across locations including; Tahiti, Cook Islands, South Australia, Tasmania and N.S.W, The Chase explores the essence of what it means to be a bodyboarder who lives to chase for incredible oceanic moments and the adventures that surround them.

programme.title: Rallye du Maroc

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Daytona 200
programme.desc: The 81st running of the Daytona 200 is one that will be talked about for a long time. It appeared that one rider might win it by a wide margin, until circumstances changed dramatically. Don't miss a moment of the race when you watch it.

programme.title: Peterson Automotive Museum Global Garages
programme.desc: Tim Allen shares his private garage containing a diverse car collection of hot rods, customs, sports cars, and even a Tesla! Some celebrity garages only have new cars, but Tim is a genuine hot rodder and enjoys building cars and driving fast.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: Round 3 marked the opening of the KZ and KZ2 categories in the European Championship. The Lucas Guerrero circuit, known for its technical layout and fast corners, provided a challenging environment for the drivers.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: Back in Italy at the stunning new Leopard Circuit in Viterbo, Round 4 of the FIA European Karting Championship takes place

programme.title: Machine Wizardry
programme.desc: Even super heroes need a little help every once in a while, our sewing machine comes to the rescue with today's projects. Teacher Ellen Miller has a little bobbin magic as she introduces us to Sashiko, a couture technique that adds so many dimensions to your sewing. Then practice a little machine wizardry with Joanne Banko. Even the most basic machine includes super sewing stitches that can make your sewing more professional. Learn how easy it is to get super results using stretch stitches, overcast, basting, and blind hem and even buttonhole stitches for super results.

programme.title: The Late Teens - Everything Had Changed
programme.desc: As the war ended, people dressed up more. Coleen Swettman uses computerized embroidery technology to create free-standing lace for accessories, collars, cuffs and trim. Women wore bloomers for sports like swimming, tennis, basketball and bowling. Tina Givens shows how to update the original bloomers to wear today. Lynn Lunoe shows how to create charming doll fashions faster than ever.

programme.title: Beading with Friends
programme.desc: It's fun to bead with friends. With a color palette for inspiration, Erin Prais-Hintz spills her beading secrets as she and Katie plan a beading party and give you more ideas for jewelry-making get-togethers. Katie uses vintage-style sliders to make glamorous chandelier earrings.

programme.title: Wrap It
programme.desc: Wrap bracelets and wire wrapping are just two ways to get wrapped up in beads. Katie shows how to embellish flip flops, Barb Switzer creates wire wrapped chandelier earrings, Erin Siegel demonstrates a leather wrap bracelet, and last featured are stacking wired bracelets; wrap it today, wear it tonight and love it every day.

programme.title: Episode 10: Make Your Own Embellishments
programme.desc: Use cutting tools, stamps, pens and markers to make customized embellishments. Julie shows how to embellish paper flowers with watercolor markers for her page layout. Next, Jenn Mason demonstrates how to make fabric tape. Then, Joe Rotella uses paper collage with scraps to cover a wooden tea box. Last, Julie uses several techniques to embellish a paper tag.

programme.title: Episode 4: Your Techniques
programme.desc: Add a different tool, a new surface, or just make a subtle change to shape up your techniques. First, host Julie Fei Fan Balzer creates a handmade journal cover using watercolor powders. Next, Micah Goguen shares a technique for creating frosted vintage botanicals. Then, Sandy McTier has a few tricks for decorative painting with her festive pumpkins project. Last is a color study -- the color grey.

programme.title: BLISSFUL LIES
programme.desc: Is about the close bond between 5 lifelong friends who are now of college age, who find the limits of their relationships are tested when secrets and lies begin to arise. There are multiple secrets between members which ultimately leave them all wondering if it is too much to move forward as the family they once were. In addition there is a forbidden love between two unlikely people. They have shared a close bond with one another since childhood. We see the bonds emerge as the characters develop and we as the audience can relate to how they feel about one another. In this dramatic film things are often not what they seem and although were able to connect with the characters in various ways, their actions are shocking.

The picture reveals the problem of drug addiction in contemporary life. Drug addiction can be resisted by strong character young people while others lose everything: friends, love and life. Metiss is a talented rapper, who managed to overcome drug addiction, but paid high price for it losing the girl he loved. One day, he comes across Linda, a young woman whom he tries to save.

It will leave you breatless, once you get off of the emotional roller-coaster.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 19
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 49
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: MILKY MESS
programme.desc: Business is brisk and Chai Raja frets as the milkman has not arrived and he is almost all out of milk. Sundar gets a so called brain-wave and lures in a genial cow from the not distant yard to help restore supply. Chai Raja is favourably impressed but then equally depressed when following the cow, enters a pugnacious bull not all happy with Sundar for wooing away his girlfriend. Its manic mayhem as the bull chases Sundar around the tea-shop, lent a generous helping hand by Basha who seems to know every trick in the book to drive the bull berserk and Sundar barking mad.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: Tika Pila Thriller
programme.desc: Bella the mouse is trying hard to balance a huge pile of books just when Mewmew zooms by making Bella trip on a pebble. So she continues walking forward in reverse mode. She is so engrossed in her new walking mode that she bumps into Deedee making her books fall all over the place. On Deedee’s query as to what new learning Bella was into, they start discussing about Tika Pila and their joined curiosity to know more about the secretive creature by asking everybody in Abra-Dabra what they know about Tika Pila. Charlie seems to know a little, but the Doobydoos are too scared to even speak about her. But Bella is determined to know all she can about Tika Pila and sets off all geared for the expedition. She is scared out of her wits by the sudden and loud hooting of Tika Pila she runs for her life and slips to a halt right in front of Deedee and Nino. Almost when Bella is about to give up her Tika Pila discovery project, Deedee encourages her by helping Bella with some magic. Deedee casts a spell to help Bella get close enough to study Tika Pila. Strengthened by the spell, Bella gives one more try. Deedee and friends soon spot Tika Pila at town-hall. But as they admire how wonderful Tika Pila looks as she eats cacti flowers they hear her hoot very differently. Bella opines that the hoots are successively different because Tika Pila wants to go back home. Just then the Doodbydoos pass by and Tika Pila follows them. Deedee comes up with a plan to lure Tika Pila back to her home by getting the Doobydoos to follow Mayor De Pfeffle holding out a plate stacked with their favourite custard sandwiches. Deedee and Bella lay cacti flowers as well for Tika Pila to follow. On seeing the wide open cacti fields Tika Pila gives a loud and happy toot and makes a run for it. Bella is so happy that she decides that something as wonderful, mystical and magical as Tika Pila shouldn’t be studied.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Sleepy Colonel
programme.desc: It is a sleep deprived Colonel and a caring bro Don who would do anything to make his big bro sleep. And there is Larry, Marly and Charly who scream the life out of Colonel. It is a war for a little calm slumber. And the brothers realize that, with the rats around, it is an impossible thing to get.

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: All Aboard
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Sneevil Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Yes You Can - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: Tota Raja
programme.desc: Chai Raja adopts a parrot (without a cage) who suddenly considers himself master of the cafe. Sundar now has to take orders from the parrot, who assumes the role of Chai Rajas second-in-command. Sundar detests the parrot but has to take good care of him to make Chai Raja happy. Basha decides to take advantage. He drops water on the parrot and the blame falls on Sundar. The parrot makes Sundars life miserable and Basha too gets caught in the parrots wrath. Sundar and Basha team up and find a way to make Chai Raja fire the parrot.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Mini Fix
programme.desc: Colonel is building a HUGE MINIATURE city out of LEGO-like blocks. There are trees and roads and houses with windows and tall buildings and a hospital and a police station and prison and pools. Now what could go wrong here???

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: Star to Star
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: HOT(H)ELL
programme.desc: Chai Raja has a wedding to attend and leaves the hotels charge in Sundars hands for the first time ever. Sundar wants to prove to his boss that he is truly capable. He is all geared up and tries everything possible to make tea in his boss style. It is tea rain all over the place with the customers cringing and getting burned. It is havoc in the teashop when Basha decides to add to Sundars agony. What follows is a mad chase. And when Chai Raja returns, what remains of his beloved eashop is just the door!!!

programme.title: BANANA BANG!
programme.desc: Its Diwali and Sundar is extremely excited for he loves everything about Diwali...the fireworks, the lights and the sweets. Chai Raja though doesnt mind the mellower ones has an aversion to the noisy crackers as they drown out his precious radio and disturb his swilling rhythm. Also Chai Raja needs to concentrate as he has to whip up special jalebis, coconut laddoos and other sweets to entice customers into his shop even on the holiday. Customers do pour in but with an excess of kids and their Diwali pistols. Sundar already has his hands full keeping the knicker-clad pint-sized cops and robbersincheck..little does he know its just about to get worse for Basha has received a special Diwali hamper from one of his old fans at the circus- the cannon clown- a huge box of the biggest and loudest firecrackers. Basha descends with a decided bang on the tea shop and proves to be such a ballistic bother that despite all Sunders efforts the tale ends with the Chai Raja and his hotel getting a Diwali makeover that a is bit too charred than Sundar would have intended.

programme.title: MONKEY KALARI
programme.desc: A Kalari Gurukkal does a demonstration outside the Chai shop and suddenly the hotel has a massive swell of customers jostling in. Chai Raja is thrilled at the sudden pile of customers as tea glasses and snacks fly off the counter and even the flies are shooed off their hangout for lack of space. The extra publicity is great and Chai Raja sends out a complimentary snack plate with Sundar to the Kalari Guru- Basha planning to swipe a few complimentary snacks himself follows Sundar but then stops short as he sees the high leaps and stunts of the Gurukkal suddenly Basha is extremely interested in learning the art. (Basha sees the kalari moves as a easy way to out-of reach snack shelves). He approaches the teacher, but the latter is a stern man and is not easily coaxed. Basha tries buttering up the Gurukkal- at first the lazy Sundar doesnt clue in but when he realizes that Basha plans to use the Kalari moves to chomp away the fries kept for the customers. Sundar decides (thought bubbles) to master the art himself and beat Basha before he can succeed. Now the Kalari Guru has two very-very interested/undesired disciples who are intent on learning- or not letting the other one learn- Kalari! Add to this the fact that Chai Raja is losing his cool thanks to Sundar neglecting the customers and his job for the sake of the lessons. Sundar has to dash off for a bit and Basha creates his own Kalari moves. Its no time for monkeying but will Sundar realize that before its too late?

programme.title: Knight Racer
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: Health On My Mind
programme.desc: Colonel is in the hospital for his annual medical check-up along with Don. But Lary Marly and Charly want fun at their cost. This time, their target is poor Colonel. And Don is a helpless and frightened witness. At last colonel and don run out of the hospital to save their health.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Cardboard Roll
programme.desc: Watch Hepi and Briko give toilet paper rolls a second more exciting life!

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Honor Code
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: April’s Rain
programme.desc: The Wise Elders ask the Guardians to tidy up their island. Negu seizes the chance to send his Dust Mutant to make the island even dirtier. Pai and Xia ask April to make it rain and clean everything effortlessly. But April hasn’t yet mastered this power, and accidentally creates a tornado. Fortunately it defeats the Dust Monster… but unfortunately, it leaves a total mess, and they still have to tidy up.

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Krazy Kites
programme.desc: The sky is filled with lovely colors and looks amazing with so many kites. Keet, Cat and Dunky are on the terrace flying kites .

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Fussy eater
programme.desc: The twins meet a mother dromedary and her child - they have a long trip across the desert ahead of them but the baby is too fussy an eater to have a healthy lunch.

programme.title: Crazy Cricket
programme.desc: Bee stings, explosions, and with frogs croaking around, this is no ordinary game of cricket. So will Don hit a six or would it be Marly?

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: The Grasshopper and the Ant
programme.desc: The long, freezing winter has arrived for both the Ants, who worked hard from Spring to Autumn, and the Grasshopper, who sang and played all along.

programme.title: Broken Umbrella
programme.desc: Giving umbrellas a second life with these fascinating ideas

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Cock a Doodle Doo
programme.desc: Keet has a visiting friend from the city -the cocky Rooster. He is a Black Belt Karate champion.

programme.title: The Missing Sliper_Based On Cinderella
programme.desc: In the story of Cinderella, our heroine flees the ball at the stroke of twelve, leaving behind one of her glass slippers. This, the Prince keeps in his bedroom until he can begin the search for the woman he intends to marry. But, the next day, when the Royal Secretary appears before the Prince, ready to begin his work, he discovers that the precious slipper has mysteriously disappeared.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: STICKY SITUATION
programme.desc: Having used his Mystic Stick to defeat a giant beaver, Pai loves his weapon more than ever. Spying, Negu gets an idea. The Guardians’ and the Elders’ possessions start to go missing, and they keep being tricked. A mysterious expert declares the culprit to be…Pai’s stick! But just as Xia’s about to burn the stick, it turns into a mutant Stick Insect sent by Negu! The Guardians battle the mutant and defeat it using Pai’s beloved stick.

programme.title: Braianna-Bot
programme.desc: When Friday transforms into Braianna to cover for her absence at school, it gives her a chance to observe how people react to her.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Fred Takes A Shots
programme.desc: Brains contracts a virus that turns her into a werewolf. Then Brains gives Fred the same disease. Brains takes her medicine, but Fred doesn’t want to, causing the symptoms to make Fred ruin Nora’s fashion show.

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Me-tal Magnet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Christmas
programme.desc: Its Christmas and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house with a Christmas tree, a small stable and stars, while Dunky is making a nice Christmas cake for the day.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Flower Power
programme.desc: Zap doubts that Leila is tough enough, but she proves you dont mess with her when Sneevil vacuums up Smightyland and the Smighties.

programme.title: Ah~ It's so cold
programme.desc: Its winter in the Unknown Forest. Duda wakes up and sees icicles for the first time and thinks they are crystal treasure. On the other side of the forest, Scot is hatching another plan to kidnap Pinkar for himself. This time he needs to dig a long tunnel, so he convinces Duda to make one for him if he loses an ice skating contest. With Dada, Bubble and Caber as judges, Scot and Duda begin their skating routines. To everyones surprise, however, Duda performs exceptionally well on the ice, spurring Scot to go further. Ultimately, Scots reckless behavior literally puts him on thin ice. Dada and the others try in every way to help him... but will they succeed?

programme.title: The Lord, Lost
programme.desc: When Xia and April go to fetch Pai after he’s spent the night guarding the Magic Fort, they find out that the Glove of the North has disappeared. While they blame Pai for the disaster, Amkko and Koto steal the Lord of the Wind. The Guardians try to get it back, only to discover it was all a cunning plan to distract them and steal the Glove of the North! But hadn’t they stolen it already? No! Pai was keeping it safe in a place they would never have guessed.

programme.title: The Prince Of The Pool – Frog Prince Case 2
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of the “Frog Prince”, by the Brothers Grimm, having been called out by the hero of the story himself: the FROG PRINCE. As well as having been turned into a frog, the prince has also lost his memory and does not know who he really is. He was perfectly content living as a frog, until one day a beautiful PRINCESS appeared at the pool and he fell in love with her. Since then, the FROG PRINCE has suffered an identity crisis. Moreover, his beloved PRINCESS has not returned to the pool. SANDRA and FO take the FROG PRINCE and set off in search of the PRINCESS, discovering that she is about to marry prince MAXIMUS, a very unpleasant character.

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Agent Alpha One
programme.desc: The Super Commander orders Brains to host a special member of the Protectors, Agent Alpha One--a dashing agent Brains admires—who turns out to be both a phony, a problem, and…and actor?

programme.title: Una porción de romance
programme.desc: Mikayla y Austin inician un experimento: ella probará sus postres y él le dará consejos sobre citas…

programme.title: El tercer intento
programme.desc: Nastia y Oleg llevan juntos cinco años. Ella lo apoya en todo. Un día lo encuentra con otra y su vida cambia.

programme.title: Amor que mata
programme.desc: Antón y Polina se convierten en las fichas de un juego mortal lleno de jugadas peligrosas, pasiones y engaños.

programme.title: Amor que mata
programme.desc: Antón y Polina se convierten en las fichas de un juego mortal lleno de jugadas peligrosas, pasiones y engaños.

programme.title: China in Focus by NTD
programme.desc: Fast, compelling, first-hand news from China; hosted by Tiffany Meier.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Ahlam El Fata El Tayesh
programme.desc: Director: Sameh Abd El Aziz - Cast: Ramez Galal / Nelly Karim - Year of production: 2007

programme.title: Teta Rahiba
programme.desc: Director:Sameh Abdel Aziz- Cast:Mohamed Henedy - Samiha Ayoub- Year of production:2012

programme.title: Maklab Haramia
programme.desc: Director: Sameh ElNaksh - Cast: Shreif Salama / Ahmed El Saadany - Year of production: 2009

programme.title: Andaleeb El Dokki
programme.desc: Director: Wael Ehsan - Cast: Mohamed Henedy / Heba Nour - Year of production: 2007

programme.title: Keef El Haal
programme.desc: Director: Ezedor Moslem - Cast: Hesham El Haweesh / Torki Al Youssef

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: SuperDad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Little Lambkin- 1940
programme.desc: A precocious toddler, wanting to return to his watermelon patch and a pair of animal friends in the country, tampers with the electronic gadgets in his new city home and creates chaos.

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: Superman: The Magnetic Telescope- 1942
programme.desc: When police interfere with a reckless scientist's experiment, it creates a deadly meteor shower only Superman can stop.

programme.title: Popeye Meets Sinbad the Sailor 1936
programme.desc: The legendary sailors Popeye and Sindbad do battle to see which one is the greatest.

programme.title: Pest Pupil 1957
programme.desc: Baby Huey, the over-sized duck, is enrolled in kindergarten but his size and clumsy attempts to fit in causes such havoc that he is expelled by the teacher. His mother then hires a private tutor, who is led a life of misery due to Huey's efforts to do good that unintentionally backfire. But the tutor winds up in the ocean---unless Huey lived on a shark-infested lake---and and is about to become a shark meal but Huey saves his life...and gets his diploma as a reward from the grateful tutor.

programme.title: The Underground World-1943
programme.desc: Lois Lane and an explorer set out on an expedition through an underground cavern and discover a race of hawk-men. When these creatures prepare a ritual sacrifice for the adventurous pair, Superman comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: Balloon Land-1935
programme.desc: The inhabitants, including the trees and rocks, of Balloon Land are made entirely of balloons. They come under attack from the evil Pincushion Man. With the help of a quickly inflated army, they manage to fend off the attack.

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Norman Normal 1968
programme.desc: After a multicolored rock group introduces the cartoon, Norman Normal is asked by a boss to wine and dine a client at a nightclub party, something Normal is uncomfortable with. He talks with his dad about it who rambles on and tells Norman, "don't make waves". At the party, Norman talks with his lampshade-clad friend Leo, disapproves of a joke told by one of the guests suspecting it's about a "minority group" and is ridiculed by the bartender for only having a ginger ale. Norman leaves the party and returns us to the multicolored rock group.

programme.title: The Paneless Window Washer 1937
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: The Playful Polar Bears-1938
programme.desc: A joyfully contented group of polar bears encounter danger when hunters arrive.

programme.title: Betty Boop- Whoops! I'm a Cowboy-1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop's runt of a suitor thinks he'll have better luck if he takes cowboy lessons at a dude ranch; slapstick results.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939
programme.desc: A hen adopts an abandoned egg which hatches into a turtle. The baby turtle becomes the butt of all the real chicks' jokes until danger threatens

programme.title: Rocket Bye Baby 1956
programme.desc: A cosmic mix-up results in a Martian baby being delivered to Earth, while an Earth baby is sent to Mars. Joseph Wilbur and his wife try to raise the green-skinned, ingenious Martian tyke as if he were an Earthling. But the kid builds his own spaceship and flies away, and Wilbur must find him and bring him back, or he'll never be able to make an exchange with the Martian parents for his own boy.

programme.title: The Candid Candidate- 1937
programme.desc: Betty Boop campaigns for Grampy for Mayor; he wins by one vote, but finds politics is no picnic. Urban renewal is parodied.

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: The Lucy Show; Season 6; Episode 1; Lucy Meets the Berles
programme.desc: Lucy moonlights as Milton Berle's secretary. She overhears Milton rehearsing a torrid love scene, thinks that the comedian is cheating on his wife and plots a suitable comeuppance.

programme.title: The Greeks Had a Word for Them-1932
programme.desc: In this sophisticated comedy Jazz Age comedy, a trio of money-hungry women all have sugar daddies who keep them in the lap of luxury, even as they drive the men crazy. Each woman represents a different personality type, from sensitive, to kind-hearted, to difficult and untrustworthy. The twenties come roaring back with immorality and in-fighting

programme.title: Cruel Cruel Love-1914
programme.desc: A silly aristocrat who believes that he has been jilted attempts suicide but he is saved from death and reunited with his fiancée.

programme.title: College - 1927
programme.desc: Ronald's high-school valedictory address praises books and condemns sports. His girlfriend Mary condemns his attitude. Fearing to lose her to rival Jeff, he decides to go to college and pay more attentions to sports.

programme.title: The Count 1916
programme.desc: The fifth film in the Mutual series Charlie Chaplin impersonates a man of means in order to underscore the contrast between rich and poor.

programme.title: Road to Bali 1952
programme.desc: Two unemployed show-biz pals accept treasure-diving work in Bali for a local princess and they find treasure, love and trouble

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
Wanted Dead or Alive: S1E17 Drop to Drink
programme.desc: Thieves are lying in wait to ambush mail carriers, so Josh is hired to help ensure that the mail will get through. The thieves have news about a $20,000 diamond ring that is being delivered.

programme.title: The Border Patrolman 1936
programme.desc: When a border patrolman catches their spoiled daughter smoking in a no-smoking area, parents hire him to watch over her. She then runs over to Mexico and gets involved with jewel thieves and he has to go save her.

programme.title: Born to Battle -1935
programme.desc: Good-natured troublemaker "Cyclone" Tom Saunders is hired by a ranchers' association manager to investigate recent cattle rustling at one of their ranches and to see if a pair of nesters have anything to do with it. After discovering the nesters, pretty Betty Powell and her rickety old father, are incapable of rustling, Tom instead turns his attention to the huge, swaggering bully of a foreman, Nate Lenox.

programme.title: Boss of Rawhide 1943
programme.desc: In the 8th film of the 22-film series, Texas Rangers Tex Wyatt, Jim Steele and Panhandle Perkins are sent to the district of Rawhide to investigate the killings of several ranchers. Tex enters the town posing as a tramp while the other two Rangers join a troupe of itinerant minstrels. Tex, convinced that while they may find the killer, it will not prevent further harassment of the poorer ranchers, and he returns to the Ranger station and persuades his father, Texas Ranger Captain John Wyatt, to take a leave of absence and go to Rawhide and run for Land Commissioner. Tex and his father meet Henry Colby, the wealthiest landholder in the district, who has been advised by his ranch foreman, Frank Hade, and Sam Barrett, the boss of Rawhide, that the nesters are the cause of all the lawlessness. At a meeting, preceded by the dullest, most demeaning minstrel show ever filmed, Captain Wyatt is shot (a fate that should have befallen the minstrels) and the bullet is found to be the same caliber as that used in the earlier killings, although Wyatt is only wounded. Mary Colby, riding the range, sees Barrett attempt to kill Tex using a rifle. Realizing he has been identified, Barrett hurries back to town where he meets the other gang members, and they prepare to fight against the Rangers

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive: S1E11: The Favor
programme.desc: Owing a favor to a sheriff, Josh agrees against better judgment to go to the lawless town of Bent Horn to bring back a man wanted for bank robbery and murder based on the word of another man who was involved in the robbery.

programme.title: Colorado Dream Hunt
programme.desc: A culmination of volunteers and donors come together to give our recipient the absolute hunt of a lifetime! First, we join Dustin on an intense spot n stalk hunt for an elk followed by a good old-fashioned prairie dog shoot.

programme.title: Hunting for a Giant
programme.desc: Our first hunt takes us along with our recipient Jacob whose dream of taking down a giant bull moose is about to become a reality. Then we join Brody, who is new to hunting but has the big dream of taking a big ol' trophy whitetail buck!

programme.title: One Shot Moose Kill
programme.desc: We start off with Keegan whose dream is to take a crack at one the largest animals in North America, then O.A.F. star Gabe is back for his first turkey hunt, lastly returning hunter Jamison is on a spot & stalk North Dakota elk hunt of epic portions.

programme.title: The OGs vs Newbees Hunting Competition: Week 12
programme.desc: A hunting competition featuring the Whitetail Frenzy originals aka The OGs vs a group of new staff members aka The Newbees.

programme.title: Ale Vigil Winemaker + Bodega Bonfati + Pasarela federal + Anabel Sanchez
programme.desc: Chicas Guapas is the first TV and online community of fashion, beauty and lifestyle with #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas. They are Latin American influencers in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Paraguay, Costa Rica, Venezuela and the UK. In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink
programme.desc: Argentinos en Miami + Warmichella + Back So Pink

programme.title: NAOMI SCOTT: estreno de SMILE 2 + Desfile MARIAN SAUD + Yo Jefa | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV del 09/11/24:
- Entrevista exclusiva de Lucía Ugarte a #NaomiScott por el estreno de #Smile2. - Cobertura del desfile de Marian Saud: Rox habló con la diseñadora y con invitadas de lujo como Candela Ruggeri, #milettfigueroa, Sofía Macaggi, Stephanie Demner y Agustina Casanova. - Tráiler de "Cómo si fuéramos sólo amigos", la nueva comedia romántica de Sebastián Badilla y Manu Viale, con Lucía Ugarte como productora ejecutiva. - Lanzamiento de #Skin1004 en Argentina: hablamos con #pampita, Paula Chávez y @SimonScaranoDermatologo. - #YoJefa: la historia de Niki Baratt, la creadora de "Niki beauty bar".

programme.title: Ágatha Ruiz de la Prada + Anamá Ferreyra + Styling con Rocío Rivero + So pink | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV
- Cobertura de la exposición de #ÁgathaRuízDeLaPrada en el Centro Cultura Recoleta: charlamos con Ágatha, Anamá Ferreyra y Liliana Parodi y Cool hunting con Rox. - The Fashion Styling Experience con Lucía Ugarte luciendo diseños de Rocío Rivero. - Hablamos con Marcelo Arias de #SoPink, invitado especial en el #FashionWeek. - Tendencias en uñas con Pamela Conde de "Conde Nails".

programme.title: Rags To Righteous
programme.desc: There’s more God wants to do through you. In “Rags to Righteous!” Pastor Steven Furtick explains that God has a plan for every pit stop on the way to your purpose.

programme.title: My Joy Is My Job
programme.desc: Don’t let your process become your prison. In “My Joy Is My Job,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that just because we feel the pressure of our situation doesn’t mean that God’s not in it with us.

programme.title: God Has Given Me Everything I Need For The Season I'm In
programme.desc: Take inventory of what you already have. Join Pastor Holly Furtick as she unpacks how to trust God with your now as He prepares you for what’s next.

programme.title: The God Of Also
programme.desc: Don’t limit your potential. In “The God Of Also,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that understanding the calling God has placed on our lives also requires us to let go of the limited idea of who we believe He’s created us to be.
